description: When a citizen's rights are violated by a sexy interrogator, he reacts swiftly to turn the tables. Kate England tortures Mr Pete as she questions him, but Mr. Pete swiftly takes her down and handcuffs her to the cage. Kate gets her throat fucked as Pete takes his revenge on the sexy but overbearing interrogator. Mr Pete needs satisfaction, so he takes Kate to an abandoned building for a full anal violation.
title: The Anal Confession
